description:
An extensive arsenal of weapons and a thirst for zombie blood are all that stand between you and a grisly demise in the pick-up-and-play action of Undead Battle Royale!
The undead have risen. Civilisation has fallen. Now only one person can bring humanity back from the brink: you! Survive the onslaught, slaughter your foes, and seize victory!

[Single]
Send your enemies back to the grave with all kinds of weapons and vehicles!
Think you're safe indoors? Think again!
Watch out for helicopters attacking from the air!
Complete missions and top the scoreboard!

[Multi]
Playable with 2-4 players!
Work together to exterminate your undead foes!
Kill giant zombies to earn giant bonuses!
Compete with your friends for the highest score!
Battle other players to find out who's really the best!
Local Multiplayer
Playable with 2-4 players!
Connect to a shared network and battle it out online!
Bring your own Nintendo Switchâ„¢ consoles and compete for the highest score!
All scores are hidden from other players, ensuring competition is fierce right up to the last second!
name: Undead Battle Royale
